page.description: Create a copy of an object instance.
page.original:
SQL::TableInfo::Clone() Syntax &ltNew_Table_Info> as SQL::TableInfo = &ltSQL::TableInfo>.Clone() ArgumentDescription &ltNew_Table_Info>A new TableInfo object. &ltSQL::TableInfo>A SQL::TableInfo object.
Description The Clone() method returns a copy of the SQL::TableInfo object. Example dim t1 as SQL::TableInfo dim t2 as SQL::TableInfo t1.Name = "MyTable" t2 = t1.clone() ? t2.Name = "MyTable"
See Also SQL::TableInfo Object Limitations
